name: FootBall Tables
description: Table used to kick a ball into the opposing goal with the hlp of rotating bars.

name: Stick
description: Stick used to move the ball or puck around.

name: Disc
description: Gliding toy used recreationally and competittively for throwing and catching.

name: Basketball
description: A thick ball that is bounced, passed with the objective of shooting in through the defender's hoop.

name: Glove
description: Used as an aid in catching and holding onto the ball.

name: Snowboard
description: Ski-like hardshell boot and plate binding system with a true directional snowboard that is stiffer and narrower to manage linking turns with greater forces and speed.

name: Harness
description: The vest that a rock-climber wears to attach himself to safety wire.

name: Shinguards
description: Built and designed around molds of actual legs.

name: Roller Skates
description: Roller skates are shoes, or bindings that fit onto shoes, that are worn to enable the wearer to roll along on wheels.
